content.json: # Delivery Optimization Dashboard --- More information on delivery optimization can be found here - https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/deployment/update/waas-delivery-optimization The following URL's should be whitelisted for communications; - *.download.windowsupdate.com - *.windowsupdate.com - *.dl.delivery.mp.microsoft.com - *.emdl.ws.microsoft.com More information on client-server communications can be found here - https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/deployment/do/delivery-optimization-workflow

content.query:
UCClient
| extend URL = "https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/ucclientupdatestatus"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,Type, URL)
| union (UCClientReadinessStatus
	| extend URL = "https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/ucclientreadinessstatus"
    | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,Type,URL))
| union (UCClientUpdateStatus
	| extend URL = "https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/ucclientupdatestatus"
    | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,Type,URL))
| union (UCDeviceAlert
	| extend URL = "https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/ucdevicealert"
    | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,Type,URL))
| union (UCServiceUpdateStatus
	| extend URL = "https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/ucserviceupdatestatus"
    | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,Type,URL))
| union (UCUpdateAlert
	| extend URL = "https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/ucupdatealert"
    | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,Type,URL))  
| union (WaaSDeploymentStatus
	| extend URL = "https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/deployment/update/update-compliance-schema-waasdeploymentstatus"
    | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,Type,URL))
| union (WaaSUpdateStatus
	| extend URL = "https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/deployment/update/update-compliance-schema-waasupdatestatus"
    | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,Type,URL))
| union (WUDOAggregatedStatus
	| extend URL = "https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/deployment/update/update-compliance-schema-wudoaggregatedstatus"
    | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,Type,URL))
| union (WUDOStatus
	| extend URL = "https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/deployment/update/update-compliance-schema-wudostatus"
    | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,Type,URL))
| where isnotempty(Type)
| project Type, TimeGenerated, URL
| sort by TimeGenerated asc

tooltipFormat.tooltip: Click here to view the Microsoft documentation on this log type

content.json:
# Update Sources for last 30 days
-----
The below statistics show the sources for update content across all devices. Downloads from the CDN and peers are determined by delivery optimization policies on your clients. 

More information on delivery optimization can be found here - https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/deployment/update/waas-delivery-optimization

content.query:
WUDOStatus
| summarize Count = dcount(ComputerID, 4) by DownloadMode, TimeGenerated
content.title: Delivery Optimization Mode - Over Time - {TimeRange}

content.query:
WUDOAggregatedStatus
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ContentType
| project ContentType, BytesFromCDN, BytesFromPeers, BWOptPercent28Days, DeviceCount
| extend TotalBytes = (BytesFromCDN + BytesFromPeers)
| sort by BytesFromCDN
content.title: Content Types - Last 30 days

content.query:
WUDOStatus 
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ComputerID
| summarize Count = dcount(ComputerID, 4) by DownloadMode, DownloadModeSrc
| project ["Download Mode"] = DownloadMode, ["Download Source"] = DownloadModeSrc, ["Device Count"] = Count
| order by ["Device Count"]
content.title: Delivery Optimization Mode

content.query:
WUDOAggregatedStatus
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ContentType
| extend BytesFromCDNGB = format_bytes(BytesFromCDN, 2)
| extend BytesFromPeersGB = format_bytes(BytesFromPeers, 2)
| extend ["Total Bytes"] = format_bytes((BytesFromCDN + BytesFromPeers),2, "TB")
| sort by BytesFromCDN desc
| project ["Content Type"] = ContentType, ["Bytes from CDN"] = BytesFromCDNGB, ["Bytes from Peers"] = BytesFromPeersGB, ["Total Bytes"], ["Device Count"] = DeviceCount
content.title: Content Break Down - Previous 30 Days

content.query:
WUDOAggregatedStatus
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ContentType
| project ContentType, BytesFromCDN, BytesFromPeers
| sort by BytesFromCDN
content.title: Content Types - By Source

content.query:
WUDOAggregatedStatus
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ContentType
| extend BytesFromCDNGB = format_bytes(BytesFromCDN, 2)
| extend BytesFromPeersGB = format_bytes(BytesFromPeers, 2)
| sort by BytesFromCDN desc 
| extend CDNDistributionPercentage = todecimal(round((100 - BWOptPercent28Days),2))
| extend PeerDistributionPercentage = todecimal(round((BWOptPercent28Days),2))
| summarize ["CDN Percentage"] = avg(todecimal(round((CDNDistributionPercentage),1))), ["Peer Percentage"] = avg(todecimal(round((PeerDistributionPercentage),1)))
content.title: Delivery Optimization Split

content.query:
WUDOAggregatedStatus
| summarize sum(BytesFromCDN), sum(BytesFromPeers)
| extend Total = (sum_BytesFromCDN + sum_BytesFromPeers)
| project pCDN = (todouble(sum_BytesFromCDN) * 100 / todouble(Total)) , pPeers = (todouble(sum_BytesFromPeers) * 100 / todouble(Total))
| evaluate narrow()
| extend percent = '%'
| project Column, todouble (Value)
content.title: Content Distribution

content.query:
WUDOAggregatedStatus
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ContentType
| extend BytesFromCDNGB = format_bytes(BytesFromCDN, 2)
| extend BytesFromPeersGB = format_bytes(BytesFromPeers, 2)
| extend TotalRawBytes = (BytesFromGroupPeers + BytesFromPeers)
| summarize ["Bandwidth Saving"] = format_bytes(sum(TotalRawBytes),2)
| extend Type = "Bandwidth Savings"

WUDOAggregatedStatus
| where TimeGenerated between (ago(30d) .. ago(0d) )
| summarize sum(BytesFromCDN), sum(BytesFromPeers) by TimeGenerated
| project sum_BytesFromCDN, sum_BytesFromPeers, TimeGenerated
content.title: Update Sources Trend Last 30 days

content.query:
WUDOAggregatedStatus
| summarize sum(BytesFromCDN), sum(BytesFromPeers) by TimeGenerated
| project sum_BytesFromCDN, sum_BytesFromPeers, TimeGenerated
content.title: Update Sources Trend Last 7 days

content.query:
WUDOAggregatedStatus
| summarize sum(BytesFromCDN), sum(BytesFromPeers) by TimeGenerated
| project sum_BytesFromCDN, sum_BytesFromPeers, TimeGenerated
content.title: Update Sources Trend Last 48 hours

content.query:
WUDOStatus
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ComputerID
| summarize Count = dcount(ComputerID, 4) by DownloadMode, DownloadModeSrc
| project ["Download Mode"] = DownloadMode, ["Download Source"] = DownloadModeSrc, ["Device Count"] = Count
| order by ["Device Count"]
content.title: Delivery Optimization Mode

content.query:
WUDOStatus
| summarize sum(BytesFromPeers), sum(BytesFromCDN), sum(BytesFromIntPeers), sum(BytesFromGroupPeers)
| extend Total = (sum_BytesFromPeers + sum_BytesFromCDN + sum_BytesFromIntPeers + sum_BytesFromGroupPeers)
| project Peers = (todouble(sum_BytesFromPeers) * 100 / todouble(Total)) , CDN = (todouble(sum_BytesFromCDN) * 100 / todouble(Total)), IntPeers = (todouble(sum_BytesFromIntPeers) * 100 / todouble(Total)), GroupPeers = (todouble(sum_BytesFromGroupPeers) * 100 / todouble(Total))
| evaluate narrow()
| extend percent = '%'
| project Column, todouble (Value)
content.title: DO Content Percentage - By Source

content.query:
WUDOStatus
| project ContentType, BytesFromCDN, BytesFromPeers, BWOptPercent28Days
| extend TotalBytes = (BytesFromCDN + BytesFromPeers)
| summarize sum(BytesFromCDN), sum(BytesFromPeers), sum(TotalBytes) by ContentType
| order by ContentType
| project sum_BytesFromPeers, sum_BytesFromCDN, ContentType
content.title: DO Traffic by Content Type

content.query:
WUDOStatus
| project ContentType, BytesFromCDN, BytesFromPeers, BWOptPercent28Days
| extend TotalBytes = (BytesFromCDN + BytesFromPeers)
| summarize sum(BytesFromCDN), sum(BytesFromPeers), sum(TotalBytes) by ContentType
| order by ContentType
| project sum_BytesFromPeers, sum_BytesFromCDN, ContentType
content.title: Content Types - By Source

content.query:
WUDOStatus
| summarize sum(BytesFromPeers), sum(BytesFromCDN), sum(BytesFromIntPeers), sum(BytesFromGroupPeers) by TimeGenerated, ComputerID
| extend BytesFromCDNGB = format_bytes(sum_BytesFromCDN, 2)
| extend BytesFromPeersGB = format_bytes(sum_BytesFromPeers, 2)
| extend TotalRawBytes = (sum_BytesFromPeers + sum_BytesFromIntPeers + sum_BytesFromGroupPeers)
| summarize ["Bandwidth Saving"] = format_bytes(sum(TotalRawBytes),2)
| extend Type = "Bandwidth Savings"
content.title: Bandwidth Saved

content.query:
WUDOStatus
| summarize sum(PeersSuccessCount), sum(PeersCannotConnectCount) by ContentType
| project ContentType, sum_PeersCannotConnectCount, sum_PeersSuccessCount
| order by sum_PeersSuccessCount desc

WUDOStatus
| summarize sum(BytesFromCDN), sum(BytesFromPeers), sum(BytesFromIntPeers), sum(BytesFromGroupPeers) by TimeGenerated
| extend TotalPeerDownloads = (sum_BytesFromPeers + sum_BytesFromIntPeers + sum_BytesFromGroupPeers)
| extend TotalCDNDownloads = sum_BytesFromCDN
| project TimeGenerated, ["Total Peer Downloads"] = format_bytes(TotalPeerDownloads, 0, "GB"), ["Total CDN Downloads"] = format_bytes(TotalCDNDownloads, 0, "GB")
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: DO Content Source Split

content.query:
WUDOStatus
| summarize sum(BytesFromPeers), sum(BytesFromCDN), sum(BytesFromIntPeers), sum(BytesFromGroupPeers) by TimeGenerated
content.title: DO Source Distribution Figures - By Type

items.name: DO Source Distribution Figures - By Type

content.query:
let AzureDeviceIDs = UCClient
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by GlobalDeviceId
| project GlobalDeviceId, AzureADDeviceId;
let IntuneDeviceIDs = IntuneDevices 
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by DeviceId
| project DeviceId, DeviceName, ReferenceId;
WUDOStatus
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ComputerID, ContentType 
| join kind=innerunique AzureDeviceIDs on $left.ComputerID == $right.GlobalDeviceId 
| join kind=innerunique IntuneDeviceIDs on $left.AzureADDeviceId == $right.ReferenceId
| project TimeGenerated, DeviceName, DeviceId, OSName, OSVersion, DownloadMode, ContentDownloadMode, PeeringStatus, ContentType, TotalTimeForDownload, TotalTransfers, PeerEligibleTransfers, NoPeersCount, PeersUnknownCount, PeersSuccessCount, BytesFromCDN, BytesFromPeers, BytesFromIntPeers, BytesFromGroupPeers, BWOptPercent7Days, BWOptPercent28Days, AzureADDeviceId
| order by TimeGenerated, DeviceName desc
content.title: Peering State
